[![puppy-tools](https://img.shields.io/badge/puppy--tools-%3C/%3E-6495ed.svg?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](#)

# Installation

1. From your godot project, clone into 'addons/puppy-bark'
```
git clone https://github.com/puppy-tools/puppy-bark addons/puppy-bark
```

2. Enable the plugin
```
Project > Project Settings > Plugins > [x] puppy-bark
```
